title: "Unspecified Error Ocurred. Please check Logs for more information"
body:
Hello I would like some suggestion's on how I can update my lol patcher to 5.15 without it coming up with this error. I've tried allowing peer to peer, deleting Projects and Solution files from RADS and have tried repairing the lol patcher. just 2 days ago it was working perfectly but when patch 15 got released yesterday it has been coming up with this error.
My laptop specs include 700HDD, 16.5 inch screen, 8 gb ram and 2.4 gigahertz with a decent internet connection
